about_the_game:
This DLC is a fully unlocked save file for Adventures of Tara. There is no additional content added but every scene in the Recall Room of the game will be unlocked and viewable at any time. After downloading this DLC, load save file 99 (you can go up from save file 1 to get to it quickly), re-save the game under save 99, and then you can load any of your previous saves to continue the game as normal but with all scenes unlocked.

Enjoy!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains adult themes and content that may not be suitable for all ages. These themes include frequent nudity, strong language, mind altering substances, explicit sex, blackmail and reluctance, goblins, tentacles, futanari, and other content that may be offensive to some.
